Headline: No trains between Forest Park and Pulaski/Congress
ShortDescription: Blue Line service continues to be suspended between Forest Park and Pulaski/Congress due to an obstruction at Cicero/Congress.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service continues to be suspended between Forest Park and Pulaski/Congress due to an obstruction at Cicero/Congress.

As a result, trains are operating only between O'Hare and Pulaski/Congress at this time.

  • Shuttle buses are available between Pulaski/Congress and Forest Park to provide connecting service in both directions.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
